bug.author: cangokalp
bug.description:
I used to be able to do a shipping package and create an executable file - I just pulled the repo, and now I'm not able to package the environment. I get the following error; <denchmark-code> C:\airsim\Unreal\Environments\Blocks\Plugins\AirSim\Source\AirBlueprintLib.cpp(52): error C2027: use of undefined type 'ULocalPlayer'
LogPlayLevel: UnrealBuildTool: C:\Program Files\Epic Games\UE_4.16\Engine\Source\Runtime\Engine\Classes\Engine/Engine.h(41): note: see declaration of 'ULocalPlayer'
ERROR: UBT ERROR: Failed to produce item: C:\airsim\Unreal\Environments\Blocks\Plugins\AirSim\Binaries\Win64\UE4-AirSim.lib
</denchmark-code>
